Room.Name: Nagaritha Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Nagaritha Drive, south of the entrance to the Amphitheatre.
Room.LongDescription: The Amphitheatre entrance lies to the north of Nagaritha Drive. It is composed primarily of grass, with a little bit of boxed seating towards the front of the theater near the stage. As dusk approaches, more and more people begin to arrive. There is a large building on the south side of the road which has a sign that reads "Dangerous Destinations: Guide to the Universe". The entrance to this building appears to be to the west.
